mapper.select: SELECT commented_Code, no_code, content, user_id, c_dt FROM commentedCode WHERE no_code = #{noCode} ORDER BY c_dt ASC

SELECT NC.commented_code, NC.no_code, NC.user_id, NC.content, NC.c_dt, NC.up_dt,
-- 좋아요 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM L_REACTION WHERE target_type = 'COMMENT' AND target_code = NC.commented_code AND reaction_type = 'L') AS likeCount,
-- 싫어요 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM L_REACTION WHERE target_type = 'COMMENT' AND target_code = NC.commented_code AND reaction_type = 'D') AS dislikeCount
FROM NO_COMMENTED NC WHERE NC.no_code = #{noCode} ORDER BY NC.c_dt DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NO_COMMENTED ( commented_Code, no_code, content, user_id, c_dt ) VALUES ( no_co_seq.NEXTVAL, #{noCode}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE NO_COMMENTED SET CONTENT = #{content}, UP_DT = SYSDATE WHERE COMMENTED_CODE = #{commentedCode}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM NO_COMMENTED
